name: Solar Lewd Hollow
description:
Solar Lewd Hollow is a morality/corruption based RPG game.
ADULTS ONLY. Join your favorite naked fighter Doug Fooker as he becomes a farmer. This parody of a potentially popular game allows you to farm, fish, and f**k as you feel content with. Doug has a farm outside of town but longs for retirement in town. You must help Doug raise the capital to purchase the home of his dreams. There are many complications. Lust is a major factor in Doug’s life and he must control his lust or bad things happen. Morality and corruption is a major component of the game. Players may make many choices but each decision has consequences. Certain areas are open based on your choices. Multiple playthroughs are required to see all aspects of the game. Players can choose a simple existence on the farm and play a relaxing casual game or they are free to explore the weird adventures in the game. Game can be played with one hand.
